text: Bathi â€œsiyakholwa kuMvelinqangi nakulokho okwehliselwe kuthina, futhi nakulokho okwehliselwa ku-Abrahamu naku- Ishmayeli naku-Isaka nakuJakobe nasezizweni, futhi nalokho okwanikwa uMose noJesu nalokho okwanikwa abaphrofethi okuvela eNkosini yabo. Asibandlululi (umphrofethi) ngisho noyedwa phakathi kwabo futhi singabazinikele kuye (uMvelinqangi)
